text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: "#TrainingNow #SoooHot<n>#BabySoftSunblock #HereIGo"

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Done and done. I wonder if Big Bro is<n>already there waiting
for me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Done and done. I wonder if Big Sis is<n>already there waiting
for me?

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: My, my. So this is where you've<n>been, Curren.

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: I don't suppose you have a minute?We would love to have a little..."talk" with you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...It's well past time for training, but<n>Curren still hasn't
showed up. I<n>checked her Umasta, but her last<n>update
was an hour ago.

text_block_list.name: Curren's Classmate
text_block_list.text: Huh? Curren hasn't shown up totraining? Oh no, what if it wasthem?

text_block_list.name: Curren's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
...Actually, a pair of seniors came by<n>earlier looking for her.
And um, they<n>looked sort of threatening...

text_block_list.name: Curren's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
I was worried, so I asked Curren if<n>she needed me to tag
along, but she<n>said she'd be fine. I didn't know<n>what else
to say, so I watched the<n>three of them leave—

text_block_list.name: Curren's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer?! She's probably behind<n>the school building!
Please hurry,<n>okay?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I dash out to the rear of the school<n>building... only to find
Curren<n>surrounded by a group of<n>upperclassmen!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Oh, Big Bro! What're you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Oh, Big Sis! What're you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah! Don't tell me I'm late for<n>training?! Aw, I'm so sowwy.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Can you please forgive me? Sniff,<n>sniff.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Oh, you mean my seniors? We'vealready finished our "talk," soeverything's all good!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Right, everyone? ♪

text_block_list.name: Upperclassmen
text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I'm so happy I got to know<n>you guys better! Make
sure you keep<n>on supporting me, okay? ☆

text_block_list.name: Upperclassmen
text_block_list.text: Cute Curren Chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Mhm, that's a great answer! ♪ Don't<n>forget to follow me on
Umasta, too! ☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: See you next time! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I'll go get changed real quick. You<n>head to the track first, Big
Bro!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I'll go get changed real quick. You<n>head to the track first, Big
Sis!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? It's not like it was a big deal,<n>you know?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I guess my seniors didn't have thebest impression of me. So... I just hada talk with them and showedthem a bit of my cuteness! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yep. They'd gotten the wrong idea of<n>me, so we had a little
chat. And then,<n>they all fell head over heels in love<n>with
me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm still extremely curious about the<n>exact contents of this
mysterious<n>"talk," but I suppose some things are<n>better
left unknown. More<n>importantly...
choice_data_list: I wish you hadn't gone alone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although nothing happened this time,<n>it very well could have
ended badly for<n>Curren. That's why I want her to<n>know
she can rely on others.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you don't have to worry.<n>Actually, I'm used to this
kind of thing.<n>Cute girls like me end up standing<n>out.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Also, I'd hate to get someone else<n>mixed up in anything
nasty, you<n>know? Whereas if it's just me, I<n>know I can
work something out for<n>sure! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
...Big Bro. There was a problem, and I<n>used my cuteness to
solve it. I'm glad<n>you're worried for me, but isn't there<n>
something else you could say right<n>now?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
...Big Sis. There was a problem, and I<n>used my cuteness to
solve it. I'm glad<n>you're worried for me, but isn't there<n>
something else you could say right<n>now?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Like, there's only one thing I want to<n>hear right now. You of
all people<n>should know what I mean, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Like, there's only one thing I want to<n>hear right now. You of
all people<n>should know what I mean, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Of course I am! ♪ And that's the end<n>of that conversation!
I'll go get ready<n>for training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...Curren had me wrapped around her<n>little finger again. I
thought I had<n>learned more about her, but it looks<n>like my
journey has only just begun.
